title: Chicken Fajitas
directions: Combine tequilla, juice from limes, ¼ cup olive oil and all spices.
Add chicken and tequilla mixture to a ziplock bag and marinate overnight in refrigeration.
Grill chicken breasts for about 7 minutes each side, let rest and cut into small strips.
With 1 TB oilve oil fry sliced vegtables in a skillet over medium high heat for 4 mins.
